column4: Hello. I have two monitors set up in twinview (nvidia). Though everytime i boot my computer, only my right monitor works and i have to go into nvidia x server settings to enable my primary one
Anybody got a clue what the problem might be?
theres a button below saying write/save configuration(saves x config file), if u are gonna save, i suggest you pick a different name
What do you mean with pick another name?
